channel.title: Noobscape Task System Problem
channel.description: The task system for noobscape source works fine expect when you kill a monster you are assigned to with mage or range. If you kill a monster with mage or range the monsters remaining you have to kill stay the same. Anyone know how to fix?

item.title: Noobscape Task System Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tepaz Tepaz
item.description:
@Tepaz wrote:

Add this to RangeEvent and SpellHandler class

owner.getActionSender().sendRemaining();

Just figure it out urself where to add them

Read full topic
